name: KEEP THE PARTY ALIVE, BABY!
description:
Imagine this, you are hosting the most groovy house party, with the grooviest DJ and the grooviest food, you are going to want to do everything in your power to keep this party alive, aren't you?

In this game, run around your house making sure the party stays alive!

- Grab a box of food from the kitchen and feed the party people!

- Throw out anyone who has drunk too much to stay at the party (idealy in trash cans)!

- Throw the cops in the trash when they show up to shut down your party

- Go out back and wack the power box in order to keep the electricity flowing to your lights!

Controls:

-WASD to move

- Hold space to pick up food and people, release space to drop them when you are close enough to a person or the bin depending on what you grabbed

Get the highest score you can, and enjoy this groovy game
